content:
Resort Amenities

  • Basketball Courts (Indoor/Outdoor)*
  • Beach Volleyball*
  • Bowling ($)
  • Fitness Center*
  • Gaming Arcade ($)
  • H2Oooohh! Indoor Water Park ($)
  • Laser Tag
  • Laundry Facilities ($)
  • Local and toll-free calls*
  • Racquetball*
  • Shuttle Service (On Property)*
  • Swimming Pools, Sauna, & Hot Tubs*
  • Tennis Courts (Indoor/Outdoor)*
  • Weekly Activity Schedules*
  • WiFi Internet Access (Galleria, Willowbrook, Lodge)*
 

*Daily Resort Fee and Service Fee will be added to the room rate. The Resort Fee allows guests to enjoy the activities above with an asterisk (*) without having to incur additional charges.

($) Indicates a separate fee applies.
